com.sterlingcommerce.ui.web.framework

Class SCUIValidationException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.lang.RuntimeException
          • com.sterlingcommerce.ui.web.framework.SCUIException
            • com.sterlingcommerce.ui.web.framework.SCUIValidationException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class SCUIValidationException
extends SCUIException
    SCUIValidationException is thrown when validation fails. Multiple field level validation can be added to this one exception either for the field Id or namespace. Generic validation exceptions can also be added. rasrinivasan
    See Also:

    • Constructor Detail

      • SCUIValidationException

        public SCUIValidationException(java.lang.String exceptionString)
        Constructor thats takes the header exceptionString as argument. exceptionString is the overall message for all the field level validation exception given.

    • Method Detail

      • addFieldErrorByID

        public void addFieldErrorByID(java.lang.String fieldId,
                              java.lang.String errorMsg)
        addFieldErrorByID method adds the fieldId and validation error message as a [key, value] pair to map. If the given fieldId already exists the error message is appended to the existing one. fieldId is of the type String errorMsg is of the type String

      • addFieldErrorByNamespace

        public void addFieldErrorByNamespace(java.lang.String fieldNamespace,
                                     java.lang.String errorMsg)
        addFieldErrorByNamespace method adds the fieldNamespace and validation error message as a [key, value] pair to map. If the given fieldNamespace already exists the error message is appended to the existing one. fieldNamespace is of the type String errorMsg is of the type String

      • getExceptionAsXML

        public org.w3c.dom.Document getExceptionAsXML()
        Description copied from class: SCUIException
        This method returns XML for this exception with the exception String as an attribute in the below format.
        <response success="false" em="exceptionString"$gt; </response> the exceptionAsXML of type XML Document
